snippet: Separatist forces apparently control a key road near Debaltseve, meaning that as many as 8,000 Ukrainian soldiers are surrounded.
abstract: As many as 8,000 Ukrainian troops remain stranded near city of Debaltseve due to separatist control of key roadway; situation puts further strain on already fragile peace agreement; Ukraine will apply for diplomatic pressure on Russia to convince separatists to open the road.

byline.contributor: Alison Smale contributed reporting from Berlin, and Michael R. Gordon from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Separatist forces apparently control a key road near Debaltseve, meaning that as many as 8,000 Ukrainian soldiers are surrounded.

headline.main: With Ukrainian Troops Trapped, a Cease-Fire Grows More Fragile
headline.print_headline: With Ukrainian Troops Trapped, a Cease-Fire Grows More Fragile

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
